description: Template schema for object-level shared-redshift mapping fit inputs.

point_fields.name: probe_name
point_fields.description: Probe identifier used for per-probe intercept/slope terms.

point_fields.name: family
point_fields.description: High-level family label: quasar or radio.

point_fields.name: survey
point_fields.description: Survey name (e.g., CatWISE, NVSS, RACS-low, LoTSS-DR2).

point_fields.name: selection_value
point_fields.description: Selection cut value in native units.

point_fields.name: value
point_fields.description: Measured anomaly metric at this point.

point_fields.name: sigma_floor
point_fields.description: Systematic floor component added in quadrature.

notes: This is a scaffold schema, not evidence of physical identifiability.
Object-level redshift calibration should replace effective mapping priors when available.
